name: @flowdev/server
description: This is the server of Flow

scripts.print-schema: npm run gen && NODE_ENV=development ts-node --transpile-only src/graphql/index.ts
scripts.type-check: npm run gen && tsc --noEmit && echo 'âœ… Type checking passed!'
scripts.build: npm run type-check && ncc build src/index.ts -o dist
scripts.copy-web: rm -rf ./dist/web && cp -r ../web/dist ./dist/web && echo 'âœ… apps/web/dist copied to apps/server/dist/web'
scripts.move-prisma-binary: mv dist/client/* dist || echo 'ðŸ”µ Ignore above error. Prisma binary was already moved.' && rm -r dist/client || echo 'ðŸ”µ Ignore above error. dist/client was already removed.' && echo 'âœ… Prisma binary successfully moved from dist/client to dist'
scripts.post-build: npm run copy-web && npm run move-prisma-binary
scripts.build:prod: npm run build && npm run post-build && echo 'âœ… Successfully built for prod!
scripts.start: npm run build -W && npm run get-web && cd dist && node index.js
scripts.gen: prisma generate && echo 'âœ… Prisma client successfully generated!'
scripts.setup:db: psql -c "CREATE DATABASE flow;" || echo "ðŸ”µ Ignore the above error. Everything is good to go!"
scripts.setup:db:test: psql -c "CREATE DATABASE flow_test;" || echo "ðŸ”µ Ignore the above error. Everything is good to go!"
